name: Cookie (Cookie)
description:
Cookie is an addicting mobile game inspired by many infinite runners. 

What can you do with cookies? Collect cookies to buy skins to show off how you like to collect those delicious things! 

Will the game get free updates? The game will get many free updates, including new skins and maybe it will launch on the Google Play Store!

Can you play it on pc? Yes you can! Shift = Slide and Space Bar = Jump
